data.name: Spread
data.detailed_description:
Follow Us

Want to follow our development progress? Follow us here:

  • Twitter
  • Discord


About the Game

Little Viny & Her Special Connection with Vines

Little Viny developed a strange disease. It also blesses her with the power to control vine plants. Viny's mother took her to the Stone Vein Hot Spring Hotel with the hope to find a cure. In the middle of the night, a loud noise woke Viny. She couldn't find her mother anywhere. What's worse, the hotel has turned into a creepy death trap...

A Run Down Hotel with Dark Secrets

The Stone Vein Hot Spring Hotel was known for its hot spring treatment that uses special minerals and vine essence. Guests came for a healing vacation, but they had no idea what they were really in for...

Solve Puzzles & Confront Danger


As you solve puzzles to navigate through the hotel's hidden rooms and use Viny's special abilities to confront danger, you will find out what happened to Viny's mother, and uncover this hotel's unspeakable secrets...

data.short_description: Spread is a horror puzzle game that pulls you into a dark, unsettling tale. Help Viny find her mother and escape from the death-trapped hot spring hotel. With the help of vine plants, solve puzzles, fight off creepy creatures and uncover the vile, twisted secrets of the hotel owner.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Graphics: No requirement
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
